posts.content: On line Booking now open www.busfest.org SSVC is in the Club section.

BUSFEST PICTURES



If anyone would like to see what BUSFEST is all about, (or re-live or maybe remember a few memories from previous years) then here is a link to our INDEX of links to ALL of our BUSFEST PHOTO Albums;

https://www.facebook.com/notes/busfest/ ... 7441789374



http://WWW.BUSFEST.ORG

BUSFEST - SO MUCH MORE THAN JUST A PRETTY PICTURE



5TH - 7TH SEPTEMBER

MALVERN SHOWGROUND

FOR MORE INFORMATION PLEASE CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE

http://WWW.BUSFEST.ORG

BUSFEST NEWS – JULY 2014



Just a gentle reminder folks that you have just 4 WEEKS now to get you CAMPING spot booked at this years event

We will close the advance bookings at the end of this month (or when we are full)

The CAMPING AREAS are filling up FAST & if you want to be in one of the areas (OTHER THAN IN SSVC Camping Area) where we have limited space (Dog Free Family Camping or Langdale Wood) then you need to get your bookings in NOW to avoid disappointment.

ADVANCE BOOKING & FULL DETAILS on what we have lined up for you at this year’s event can be found on our website;

http://WWW.BUSFEST.ORG

Just in case you need reminding, or are coming to Busfest for the first time & want to see a few pictures from previous BUSFESTS here is an INDEX & LINKS to ALL of the BUSFEST Picture albums;

https://www.facebook.com/notes/busfest/ ... 7441789374
Booking online will close at the end of this month,

BUSFEST CAMPING - FINAL CALL

Just a gentle reminder folks;

WE ARE NOW IN TO THE FINAL FEW DAYS before we CLOSE bookings for CAMPING at this years BUSFEST.



The CAMPING AREAS have filled up FAST & if you want to be in one of the special areas where we have limited space (Dog Free Family Camping or Langdale Wood) or ANY of the other areas then you need to get your bookings in NOW to avoid disappointment.

ADVANCE BOOKING & FULL DETAILS on what we have lined up for you at this year’s event can be found on our website;

http://WWW.BUSFEST.ORG

MAIN FAMILY & CLUB CAMPING AREAS are now SOLD OUT.



FAMILY AREA (Dog free) camping family tickets are still available, if you do not have any dogs then you will be able to purchase Dog free area family camping tickets instead.

We also still have a few Camping Plots left in GENERAL CAMPING & LANGDALE WOOD.

If you have dogs then you will need to select either general or Langdale Wood tickets.

We will be completely full & closing bookings for camping sometime tomorrow (Sunday)



http://WWW.BUSFEST.ORG

The ADVANCE BOOKING system for CAMPING at this years BUSFEST is now closed. We are FULL



WWW.BUSFEST.ORG

Bugger !! I usually book well in advance & camp in the SSVC plot - but this year not got my act together & left it too late for various reasons ! Is it possible to turn up at the SSVC plot & pay on arrival or is the SSVC plot also full ??

Not sure who to contact, but we have family camping tickets and usually park our splitty with our friends in this area, unfortunately we'll be on our own this year. So do you have any space available in the SSVC club area? As we'd like to join you this year.

I'll be coming along will the wife and 2 young kids, we 'll need space for a drive away awning.

Many thanks in advance, hopefully see you all their in September.

Look out for my splitty (Dubbed Images, now with banded white wheels)

Forgot to say we are current members of the SSVC and if you need my membership number, please contact me.

Cheers

W.
